actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affiars with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1560.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to authorize the sale of certain public lands in Alaska to the Catholic bishop of northern Alaska for the use as a mission school," approved August 8, 1953.

summary.text: Amends the act entitled "An act to authorize the sale of certain public lands in Alaska to the Catholic bishop of northern Alaska for the use as a mission school," approved August 8, 1953.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to authorize the sale of certain public lands in Alaska to the Catholic bishop of northern Alaska for the use as a mission school," approved August 8, 1953.
